tool_description: The x.com API offers comprehensive access to both public and private data, empowering developers to seamlessly integrate and extract information from Twitter. This versatile API supports various functionalities, including search, Tweets, user details, followers, images, media, and more.
name: X com
title: X com

A comma separated list of Tweet IDs. Up to 100 are allowed in a single request.

api_list.name: search

required_parameters.name: q
required_parameters.description:
Search query

You can use advanced search queries. E.g. dogecoin (from:elonmusk) Check out for more information: https://twitter.com/search-advanced
